ingredients.item: 350g tub Waitrose Cherry Tomato & Basil Sauce (find in the chiller cabinet)

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water for 10 minutes until just tender.
Meanwhile, spray a large, non-stick frying pan with oil and cook the leek and chicken for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook for
a further 3–4 minutes until the chicken is golden and cooked through with no pink meat.
Add the sauce and chipotle paste to the pan and simmer together for 1–2 minutes until piping hot.
Drain the pasta and return to the pan. Add the sauce mixture and stir together well. Divide between two bowls and sprinkle with cheese and parsley to serve.
